name: Whoopee Scholarship
description:
Developed a school management tycoon game using C# in Unity 3D. 

Whoopee Scholarship is a school tycoon game with students and different teachers to manage. What will you do if you had a school to build up all by yourself?

  • You must have over zero gold, don't go bankrupt! 
  • You also need maintain the student’s fun meter, by keeping them engaged.
